Struct LocalisableString

Namespace
osu.Framework.Localisation

A descriptor representing text that can be localised and formatted.

IsNullOrEmpty(LocalisableString?)

Indicates whether the specified LocalisableString is null or an empty string.

public static bool IsNullOrEmpty(LocalisableString? value)

Parameters

value LocalisableString?

The LocalisableString to test.

Returns

bool

true if the value parameter is null or an empty string (""); otherwise, false.

Remarks

Will always be false for non-string data (e.g. TranslatableString).
